title: Text to Image Generation with Diffusion Based Models

definitions.Diffusion Process: Diffusion models are inspired by non-equilibrium thermodynamics. For a small fraction of the time, it is difficult to determine whether particles are moving in the direction of mixing or in the opposite direction.

summary: The slide discusses diffusion models inspired by non-equilibrium thermodynamics. It highlights the difficulty in determining the direction of particle movement during the diffusion process.
